Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good toilet, complete kit w/ soft-close seat
Author: Andrew
Review: Install went mostly according to plan, however the bolts to secure the toilet to the floor were too long and had to be cut. The only tool I had available was a hacksaw blade, so this took a lot longer than expected. Only other complaint is that the seat attachment design and hardware seemed cheap compared to other seats I have installed (replacement seats). Overall, the toilet flushes great, installs according to typical instructions, and everything else went smoothly. The flush mechanism, handle, flap, and standpipe came preinstalled in the tank, with no issues or leaks. The toilet does NOT come with a hose to connect the tank to the wall water supply, as this is specific to each house, but make sure to note that if you are replacing a shorter bowl height toilet with this one, your existing supply line will likely be too short. You should replace it anyway. Overall this seems like a great replacement and includes a lot of value and convenience as a complete kit.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easy Install
Author: Rusty
Review: This was a very easy install. Make sure that you have someone to help carry the box to the area of the install prior to unpacking if you can. All of the items were included for the install which saves time and trips for something that you may have forgotten. Be sure to clean the flange area prior to installing the new seal. I found that installing the bowl by itself without the tank was easier for me to handle. The tank was easy to attach. Be sure to not overtighten any of the fittings. Once ...

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Hotel Flusher
Author: Rope cushions
Review: The first thing I want to say is if you've ever stayed at a hotel and used their toilets, and they almost suck you in when you flush, well that is exactly how this toilet works. Scared me the first time I flushed it. It comes with easy to install instructions which is a plus, all the hardware you need to install the toilet minus your water supply line comes in the box. I do not care for the toilet seat that accompanies this system. I feel that the seat is cheap and the hole in which you use is too small. I am not a large person and it still feels uncomfortable, and the screws that come with it to install the seat are extremely long, could definitely use shorter screws and metal not plastic would be nice. Also when installing the tank to the base, you might want to have a 17mm socket available to help tighten down the bowl. Once the toilet is in place, you only have a few inches from the wall to try and secure the screws provided. I used a 17mm socket to help secure the nuts to the bolts. Overall since I just installed this last night, I do like this product and think with a few minor changes it would be the perfect product.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Gorgeous toilet
Author: EricF
Review: When I got the toilet, was thinking it is no different than any other, but after getting it installed it was apparent that it’s better. It stands a little higher making it much easier to get off of and is built heavy duty making it sit firm in place while installing and using. Had everything I needed for the install. This is a gorgeous looking toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great functioning toilet
Author: BigSal1
Review: A toilet is a toilet pretty much. Good things about this toilet is it’s powerful flush. Toilet looks and installs just like all the others. I see no difference appearance wise compared to other brands. Box is a complete toilet install kit with everything. Install was easy. Typical install directions

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Looks good and works well in our small space.
Author: Ron
Review: We are renovating a small half bath, and we needed to replace an old high-flow toilet. We chose the round bowl because of our limited space between the toilet and the vanity. This new toilet fits our small space and looks very good. The package included everything needed for a complete installation except the line from the water supply to the tank inlet. They really could not include that line because I needed to measure the distance to buy the correct line length. Everything was packaged compactly in an single box with lifting handles on the sides. An inner box contains the tank, tank cover, and instructions. I didn't notice that the cover was packed below the tank until after removing the tank from the box. The instructions were clear, and the installation was reasonable. It was easy to set the toilet square and level, and there were no leaks after following the instructions. Before trying this toilet, I had some general concern about the effectiveness of the low-flow operation, but this toilet appears to have a powerful flush. The tank is almost as large as the one on the old high-flow toilet, but the mechanism appears to meter less than half of the tank capacity for each flush. The weight of the remaining water provides more force for the limited water that is delivered in a flush. Each flush appears to clear the bowl completely, and we have not had any problems with it. This bowl height of this toilet is higher than the one that we replaced. Our consensus is that this height is more comfortable than the lower bowl, but I expect that is a matter of personal preference. This provided a good solution for our particular renovation need. It fits our small space, works well, and looks good.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Installed fairly easy
Author: JohnBear
Review: I only seemed to have some trouble because my plumbing is old and the flange was broken on both sides. But the toilet installed fairly well. I don't like how the tank connects to the bowl, The gap is really large.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great looking ADA compliant toilet!
Author: Clem
Review: The extra 3 inches in height being an ADA company toilet makes a big difference. I'm 6'1" and it helps to not have to squat down so far. Toilet came with everything needed to install. It seems well built and looks great!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Manufacture does not inspect the product
Author: ForexAlien
Review: Toilet was never inspected and was made with a 1/2" slant to the right, it must have been dropped before placed in the kiln to be fired.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Five Stars! Would Poop Here Again!
Author: Big Daddy
Review: Let's face it. I'm old and fat. Which means I'm usually cranky and use the bathroom. A lot. I used to spend hundreds of dollars every quarter on my water bill. Before this toilet, you might say I was "flushing away money". Don't get me wrong, I still spend hundreds of dollars every quarter on my water bill BUT I do indeed spend fewer of those hundreds than I did. Since installing this comfortable and more efficient toilet, I now have a much happier experience first thing in the morning (I eat fiber so I'm still regular! Laugh if you will but when you get old and fat and cranky, being regular is a major victory!)

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Bad toilet seat
Author: Critic18
Review: Installation was as expected. Toilet works fine, and flush reasonably good. Though I'm very disappointed in the seat. If I knew that I would have bought the cheaper model without the soft close lid. There's no way to tighten the lid down from not sliding. Everytime one sit down the seat slide. To be expected from cheaply made plastic lids and seats. After spending this much on an American made toilet I have no choice but to spend more to get another aftermarket wooden seat and lid that won't slide. My advise, save your money and buy the regular model without soft close lid since you will be ending up spending extra on another seat and lid.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice to have a USA made toilet for once
Author: NewToiletguy
Review: I purchased this to replace a contractor installed Project Source unit that I had for over 6 years. It was not smart height and it had a round front. It also didn't flush well at all. This unit on the other hand, is much nicer. It flushed well and with the elongated front, is much more comfortable to a man to use. The only carp is the hold down bolts are much too tall and the supplied caps don't cover them. Thus I had to use a hack saw to shorten the bolts so the decorative caps would work. The best solution would be to provide taller caps. The complete kit was a bonus and I installed it myself. It does not rock on my tile floor and has not leaked.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great toilet, easy install, bad color
Author: Tony
Review: This toilet was super easy to install. Took roughly 30 minutes from opening to flushing. Only problem is their white is not a bright white. Doesn’t match well. Unfortunately living an hour away and needing a toilet sacrifices were made.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easy install
Author: Diane
Review: My husband installed ours last evening and he had no issues. Went very smoothly. We like the fact that it sits higher than our old one. That and the slow close lid were 2 things we were looking for when we chose which toilet we were going to buy. Our only complaint is the seat/lid is very cheaply made. We’ll be going back to the store and buying a new seat for it. Otherwise I’d have given it 5 stars.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Powerful
Author: Bernie
Review: We've had this toilet for a couple of weeks now. It is working fine and the flushing action is very powerful. Don't know how it works, but when you flush it sounds like water is being pushed in with force and sucked out as well. When we installed it, the tank bolts didn't line-up perfectly with the bowl so when we thought everything was ready to test, it leaked a little at one of the bolts. Loosening the bolt and wiggling a little resolved the problem and there has been no problem since then. If we decide to replace our remaining chair height toilet with a comfort height one, we will buy this one again.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: DO NOT buy the Mansfield Summit Toilet
Author: JustSayNoToMansfield
Review: We purchased three Mansfield Summit toilets and had them professionally installed. The contractor triple checked everything and by evening all three were leaking between the tank and the bowl. I called the contractor and he said he had concerns with the design of the cheap plastic bolts provided. He returned the next day with better bolts and washers. That didn't fix the problem because the bolt holes are not smooth allowing a flush (no pun intended) fit. We are replacing all three with American Standard toilets. Is Mansfield going to pay my contractor? Absolutely ridiculous their faulty manufacturing is going to cost me double installation. Bottom line save yourself the headache - DO NOT BUY. I wish I had read the other one star reviews which address the same problem before I purchased these.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Mike
Review: I purchased this toilet yesterday and installed it this morning. the wax seal leaked and the tank bolts leaked. I replaced the wax seal included with this toilet. I used a rubber type From Fluidmaster. It doesn't leak. I replaced the leaking bolts with a tank bolt and seal kit from True Value Hardware store. I am glad this toilet was made in America. However, the two places where the new toilet can leak did so. I worked in Commercial Facilities for over 35 years doing plumbing work to include toilet repair and replacement. I am hopeful that Mansfield will read this review. Please improve the seal kits provided with this toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Badly Designed
Author: Tracie
Review: Like other reviewers, I bought this because it's made in the US and assumed it'd be a well-made product. I have a licensed plumber here now because the toilet won't stop leaking out of the tank. The holes are misaligned to the base. The hardware to attach to the base are junk. He replaced the hardware and it's still leaking. He's on his 2nd trip to the plumbing store now. I am someone that will spend hours researching for items made in the US and will pay more for them. It's a sad day when imports are of better quality than a US product. I can't wait to see my install bill since the plumber is basically rebuilding the toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Cindy
Review: This product was defective out of the box. Toilet seat broken. The screw holes were not drilled correctly and the professional plumber I paid had to take it apart three times as it leaked. The only way it wouldn't leak was to tilt the tank back wards. He said this was just a temperary fix and that it would leak again. The lid to the tank will not sit level. Lowes was of no help. Basically said I couldn't return it as it was all ready installed, but id I had Lowes do the installaion it would be under warranty for a year. What a way to get your money. I have never had Lowes not stand by their products but I will not take another chance with them ever! Poorly made toilet and poor customer service from Lowes.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Complete tank kit already assembled is a big plus!
Author: Tidefan57
Review: Our plumber recommended this toilet because it has the 3-bolt tank to bowl system. The height is perfect, and although the lid did feel a more narrow… I still give it a 5. Normally you wouldn’t be there for very long so it wasn’t a dealbreaker (right?).

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Leaks
Author: Nothappy
Review: I have worked in the construction field for 35 year's. Residential and commercial, if you would like to avoid any problems don't by this , it's not worth the hassle. Leaks from bottom of tank right out of box ,I have tried everything I know, and even had a couple of friend's who were plumber's take a turn at it it still Leaks. Just thank God didn't have to pay them. By a different brand youl be better off. Will let all that I come into contact with in the construction field to stay away from this product.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Strong flush
Author: Tims
Review: I’m extremely happy with this toilet, previous toilet was old and ugly with poor flushing. We had a Mansfield toilet installed downstairs a few years back and when we replaced the upstairs I wanted the same toilet. The newer one is even better.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield toilet
Author: mickey
Review: I love the extra 2 to 3 inch heighth..I am a seni0r citizen...That extra heighth makes it much easier to get up from the toilet..

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Leaks Leaks and more Tank Leaks
Author: troyrb
Review: Let me start by saying I have installed over 20 toilets throughout the years and never had issues. I fought with this toilet for two weeks after I installed it and no matter what I did, it leaked. I even went out and bought a separate tank seal and tank bolts. It still leaked with the replacement parts. I finally called my Lowes store and took it back for an American Standard replacement. I will never buy this brand again.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Decent toilet once installed.
Author: John
Review: A toilet is a toilet. As long as it flushes with power and stuff goes down the drain without clogging it has done its job. However, not all toilet installs are created equal. I bought the toilet because its made in US and I figured it would be great quality. I didn’t check the reviews and I should have. This toilet has some QC issues and some included hardware is shoddy. The bolts holding down the tank were rubber pegs. It seemed ok at first but even tightened down they leaked. Also the holes between the base and the tank for the pegs were not alligned perfectly contributing to the leaking. I ended up installing the tank twice. The second time I put some wax from a left over wax ring around the peg and seated it in tank to water proof it. This resolved the leaking during the install. The second shoddy piece is the seat. Again the bolts didnt properly align with the holes in the base so I am not sure how long it will take before the hinges crack. Once installed the toilet does toilet things as you would expect. For installation save yourself the headache and go with a different brand.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet kit!
Author: Dale
Review: Only issue I had was having to return the toilet seal that I bought because this one included it. It has everything you need for the job. Great packaging and easy to install.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Make sure you look at the boxes carefully.
Review: Well built TOILET, but a cheap seat that does not stay tight. This makes it difficult to keep seat upright for those of us who stand up to be relieved. Everything is in the kit, and it flushes quickly and effectively without "swirl" effect. Be careful to select 10" or 12" (12" is most common) and we chose the elongated a higher rise toilet..... what a nice difference over the 12-14" high units with round bowl!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice toilet, good flushing action.
Author: Blackdog48
Review: Flushes well for the price. Has a weight on the chain so if you just need a quick flush, it stops it quick. Need a longer one, just hold it for an extra second.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Suspected Manufacturing Defect
Author: CabinetBuilder
Review: Installed and tested, leaked at the tank to bowl bolted connection. This is a three bolt connection. I found the bolt holes would not align correctly from the tank to the bowl, appears to be a manufacturing defect. The only way to get all three bolts installed required one of them to be misaligned which meant the rubber seal would not work correctly. Ended up returning the entire unit and replacing with a different brand at a slightly higher price. No issues with the new unit.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet and Installation
Author: Kathie
Review: Toilet is the perfect height, flush mechanism saves money in the amount of water needed. The installation is another matter. I would never use the specific installer that Lowes sent. Why not? Very unprofessional. Could not find proper installation equipment, left to do another job, my husband found the equipment after I had already gone back to Lowes, applied toilet seat on sideways and lastly the amount charged for installation way over price it should have been. I will think long and hard before buying and using Lowes installers again. I think they have changed their standards since we had a patio door installed a few years ago that was 5 star for product and installation. Too bad.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Some concerns...
Author: BuyAmerican
Review: The internal components are cheap which is surprising given the price of the toilet and overall great design and look. I'll be replacing the fill valve and flapper pretty immediately. Other main concern was the rubber donut from the tank to the bowl seems to leak no matter what I do or how tight I screw those screws so I guess I'll be putting some clear silicone on that to get that to stop leaking.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Issues
Author: Shom
Review: The toilet we purchased did not sit level on a level floor. The flapper was very firm and slammed down with a thud and the flushing process was loud. It seems that the new 1.28 gallon toilets are louder in general due to the design force required to evacuate solids with less water. We returned it for a Lowe's American Standard #88575. Glad we did.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good comfortable toilet, great flush
Author: ToiletKing
Review: I had to replace my low 1970s harvest gold toilet for my disabled mom. I picked out the Mansfield Summit chair height elongated bowl based on the footprint, I have a furnace register behind the toilet so some toilets just won't fit. Installation went off without a hitch. Mom finds it easier to get on and off. Now he is the important part, I'm a 6'5" 300 lb man and find the added height very welcome, my feet no longer fall asleep while sitting on the pot. Also the flush can handle whatever I can throw at it without problem, around work I am known for causing plumbing problems....

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: efficient, powerfull, economical flusher
Author: fluffhead303
Review: Overall, I'm really happy with this fixture. I chose this over similar models from the other names because it is American made and nicely priced. I like the 3" rigid flapper with replaceable silicone rubber seal a lot. It closes with a slight bang, but the flush is amazingly powerful, especially considering the efficiency. I think a softer rubber universal replacement flapper would make it quieter, but in my powder room, the noise is no issue. I like that it has 3 tank bolts instead of 2. The patented bolt design is strange, but I still like it better than Kohler's 3-bolt/funky seal design. There is no need for lots of torque, but you must be methodical in tightening them. Do it gradually in an alternating pattern like with lug nuts. The documentation indicates the correct order. I learned if you rush that step, it will leak. Look out for stray bits of loose glazing in the tank box and make sure there are none in the fill valve before connecting the supply. The pre-assembled tank components required no adjustments at all. The seat seems cheap, but it will do the job until it breaks.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good replacement toilet with cheap seats
Author: MrsCid
Review: I like the design of this toilet. It sets back in front so it was great for our one tiny bathroom. (We purchased two toilets) Both had more room behind them and I like having more room to clean therel. The tank is smaller and fit right next to the wall. One of our previous toilets had set several inches away from the wall. The design on the outside looks like it will be easier to clean and keep clean as well. The flush sounds strong and seems to rinse the toilet bowl well. The flush is loud and makes a pretty good 'thunk' as the stopper drops in place. The chain needed adjusting and one of them broke as it was so thin. The flushing handle seems cheap and flimsy. The slow-close seats are plastic, very lightweight, take forever to close, and keep coming loose. We will be replacing them. The money we spent seemed to be in the china parts of these toilets. The lightweight chain, flimsy feeling flushing handle and cheap lightweight seats were disappointing.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: my notes to Mansfield awaiting reply BEWARE!
Author: bobc
Review: I purchased two Mansfield summit elongated toilets from Lowe’s a few days ago. They are part of a larger project which includes 2500 dollars worth of luxury vinyl plank flooring in my small condo. One installed upstairs. Will Not Stop leaking from tank to bowl after twice being professionally installed. I turned off water and flushed to empty as it IS NOT USABLE AND WILL RUIN MY FLOORS. the downstairs toilet also was leaking so I have replaced with another brand. I cannot get to the upstairs toilet as my stairs have just been refinished. My contractor did some research and found that this appears to be a common tank to bowl issue. I am disabled and will be required to PAY FOR REMOVAL AND RETURN, as well as purchase another brand that will work properly. Please tell me how your company deals with this issue for consumers. I’ve seen these types of notations all over the internet. Another 250 bucks is a lot of money to me!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Very hot or miss on this toilet - avoid
Author: Athens fixer upper
Review: The first toilet I bought was completely broken in box so had to return it. The second toilet took the plumber about an hour to install. Then the tank started to leak. Plumber came back next day and said that tank construction was defective and that the tank seal would never be able to do its job. Plumber brought a western toilet and installed it. Should have started there in the beginning!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: leaking tank
Author: frustrated
Review: I have just completed a total finished basement install and the toilet was pretty much the last thing to be done by the contractor. I wish I had read these reviews before I purchased the toilet because it has leaked from the bolts at the base of the tank all over my brand new floor and the water is also under the baseboard now. The plumber is coming back to look at it, but it seems like this is just a very poor product that I'm not sure will be able to be repaired. I have no recourse with the construction company because I purchased the toilet and other bathroom fixtures.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Tough Installation
Author: Jim7392
Review: There are 3 fasteners to hold tank to base. After installing, the tank leaked from the fastener at the 12 o'clock position. We had to drain and remove the tank. Checked for cracks and found none. After reassembly, it now leaked from fastener at the 1 o'clock position. Drained and inspected the bolt, plastic dip was deformed. The instructions show no part number for these fasteners and both Lowe's or the manufacture were any help. Wound up using plumber's putty to seal leak.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: May be a fluke but...tank won't seat properly.
Author: Drumdude78
Review: The tank won't seat properly. I tried 6 times to seat it & it still leaks. I guess when you buy a $150 toilet, you get a $150 toilet. American standard would've been twice as much but my guess is, it would've worked right the first time

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great quality for the price
Author: TheOtherJohn
Review: As stated in other reviews, this toilet has a strong flush. Because we are a commercial operation, we opted to adjust the float downward to allow more water per flush. It is done easily by removing the plastic keeper from the chain and moving the float to a lower position and reinstalling the keeper. Overall, a very nice toilet. We have installed many in our facilities and haven't had any problems at all. The included seats are plastic, they work fine but are not as sturdy as solid seats. note: Be careful not to overtighten the mounting bolts, they will break.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet seat included
Author: Bebe Oli
Review: GOOD price and included toilet seat was an added bonus.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: It flushes
Author: MaryB
Review: The only toilet made that flushes properly

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet
Author: CJ21
Review: Cheap seat/lid

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield Summit Toilet
Author: Jackson
Review: Purchased 2 of these Summit toilets. One of them was fine. The other toilet was missing the seat bolts and the tank bolt holes were not even close to lining up with the bowl bolt holes. A full one inch off. Will return this one.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Quality Built
Author: Crk
Review: Just received this toilet a few days ago so I have not installed it yet. But, I have opened the packaging and instructions and can tell this is a quality product as I have installed several toilets before. I especially like the fact that it comes with the seat and the wax ring included. Toilets are usually very easy to install so I do not anticipate any problems with the install.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Packing
Author: Troon66
Review: The packing and handling of these toilets are sub-par. Returned the first one because base was cracked. Second one had a hairline crack also.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Doesn't flush all the way
Author: dan0001
Review: The toilet flapper has a weighted ball so that when you flush, the flapper slams shut in less than 2 seconds causing an incomplete flush. When you flush, it immediately stops the flush. After you urinate and flush, there is still urine left unflushed. When you poop, there are bits of poop left. Also, the flush is very very loud. The sound of a jet of water followed by the loud THUD of the flapper closing hard. I am very sorry I bought this. The previous toilet we had by Mansfield had a tower flapper. It worked very well.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Tank leaks at bowl
Author: StuckLeaker
Review: I should have keyed on reading the 1 star ratings, not the 5 star. I wasn't expecting issues. As soon as opening box, parts check found everything was included. After cleaning old wax seal and surrounding floor, installed new wax seal and mounting bolts and then bowl. Perfect. Installed tank seal and set tank on bowl. As I placed tank to bowl bolts in 3 locations, back position last, I noticed the rear holes didn't line up like the 2 fronts. Went ahead and did the wiggle, jiggle before tightening all the way. No wobble so it must have been just my imagination. Hooked up the water line and before I could stand up, water started splashing onto the floor. I turned the water off and flushed to empty the tank to stop the leak. Wiped up the floor and sponge drained the tank as the water still dripped. Removed the 3 bolts, looked over the bottom of tank for cracks, extra material, anything that wouldn't allow to seal and nothing. Set tank back on base and repeated with same result.... water leaked onto my floor. Time to go buy "Another" new toilet from Lowe's. From other reviews, I see Lowe's will not refund since they didn't do the install. Maybe I won't use Lowe's next time.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield Drip
Author: bobc
Review: Bought two for my contractors to install. One tank was cracked at the seam which was obvious only after filling with water and that water all over my brand new luxury vinyl floors. The tank upstairs is installed properly but leaks slightly at every flush. Not sure what the malfunction is with these toilets. Either a design flaw or manufacturing quality defect.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Works great and looks very nice for a value toilet
Author: Big Daddy T
Review: For a value toilet, it's really a nice looking toilet. I would give 5 stars but they left out the toilet seat bolts. I went to hardware store because it was closer and less hassle, but a complete set is supposed to be a complete set. The bolts I got from the hardware store don't exactly fit so I'll have to go get another set, more hassle. I recommend the toilet for the price 100%, just don't be surprised if you have to make a run to the store. Function is very good, wife says the power reminds her of a nice hotel toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Billy
Review: These are very stable, good looking toilets with a very good flush.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Highly recommend
Author: Holmes
Review: My husband and I purchased this toilet for my elderly parents. In our rush to make a purchase, as it was needed right away, we initially used google for a recommendation and purchased one made by Delta. Immediately, we noticed the water flow during flushing was poor. I called Delta and was told they were aware of the issue and that multiple flushes and frequent cleanings were recommended. So, I started doing some research to replace it. Mansfield Summit was the solution. Installation was standard and the flush was exactly what was expected; one flush for solids. My parents are very pleased. Cons, the seat that comes with it is poorly constructed, a disappointment. You will need to replace it. I’m not kidding, it’s that bad. Also, Mansfield packages their toilets upside down, so don’t be thrown off when you open the box. By the way, it is made in the USA. We were all very happy about that!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Won't stop running!

Looks like the money I saved buying a cheap toilet will go towards my new, improved water bill!!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet1

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Author: Collin

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Design and quality problems
Author: EricD
Review: I really wanted to like this Made-In-USA toilet. But it's turned out to be the most problematic toilet I've ever installed. I've probably installed around 20 over the last 20 years. The handle on the first one had a defect that caused the handle to stick and hold the flapper open. I had to lift the handle back up to make it close. I got another toilet and the handle worked fine. The donut that goes between the tank and the bowl is made of stiffer rubber than any other toilet I've installed. This stiffness appears to have caused the donut to leak. I purchased an after market donut that was squishy like normal and the leaks stopped. The tank bolts are a weird design. The seal is integral to the bolt. One out of three of these bolts kept leaking on me. I switched to the standard design with separate bolt and washer and it was fine. I wasted a lot of time on this toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Tank leaks

Called a plumber back twice only to have him tighten the connectors, but it still leaked. Third time I went back to Lowe's bought big washers and had the plumber come out again to install. My toilet went from 149.00 to 200.00. I should have bought a kohler

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Decent toilet but has few issues
Author: DIYer
Review: This is a nice toilet; looks nice and sleek. I am *generally* happy with my purchase, but there were a few things that posed an issue. First, the bolts that hold the toilet tank to the bowl; these are not washers and bolts that used to be standard (but seem to be with repair kits; go figure), but rather a bolt with a rubber head. I had difficulty with two of three bolts, in that they leaked. I had to loosen, reset, tighten and really torque the bolts down, to the point I was afraid I would crack the porcelain. I don't know why this was changed from the old rubber washer with separate bolt; I've never had any issues with that style leaking in the past. Second, the fill valve, although a Fluidmaster and a reputable brand, "popped" on the second day after install. I heard a horrific noise, and went to the bathroom to see what had happened. I thought a pipe had burst, only to find that the toilet water was now running. Lifting the lid, I found that the noise was caused by the top of the fill valve giving way, and hitting the toilet tank cover, which was now continually filling. Apparently a "lesser quality" fill valve was included, and I had to purchase another, adding $20 to the original cost of the toilet. Third, the flapper included is horrible. The bottom is made of plastic, not rubber, and consequently, when the flap closes, it makes a LOUD slapping sound. This too had to be replaced along with the fill valve, included in the Fluidmaster Repair Kit that I had to purchase. Why have a "silent close" lid, when the sound of the flapper closing is about a loud as a toilet seat dropping? Makes no sense. I imagine that "cheaper" lower quality fill valves come with the toilet. Please, either supply quality kits with the toilet and raise the price, or just don't supply them at all, and lower the price of the toilet. While it's been quite a few years since I had to purchase a new toilet, I realize that they are now made to conserve water, but what is the point if you have to flush the toilet three times in order to have a completely empty toilet? In general, it's a toilet. Personally, I'm not into the "design" as I am with the function. While it was convenient to have everything supplied for installation, it's still aggravating to have to go back to the store to replace an inferior quality fill valve and flap. The water conservation feature is something I will have to live with since this seems to be the standard now. Take away is this; hold onto your old toilet as long as you can, because prices are going up, and quality is going down.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Review: its 2021 people, throw in a quiet close/slow close seat for crying out loud. who wants to have a seat slam shut every time? get with the program, Mansfield. I'm going back to Kohler in my next build.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: What they said...plus my installation suggestions
Author: RandyN
Review: Made in USA, great product, very happy. Bought 2 for house with 3 toilets, wife primarily uses 2 of them so I wanted them to be the same so she wouldn't flop onto the shorter one. It is tall. You can read the other comments, I agree with them. So let me offer these suggestions. It is 95 pounds. I bought online so someone would deliver it to my car at Lowe's. At home, I opened the box in the driveway and carried it in two pieces rather than trying to lug a 95 pound box myself.The bottom is still heavy, hard on the back. New appreciation for plumbers. Regarding the flange bolts being too long, that is correct they need to be cut. After removing my current toilet and cleaning the area, I noticed those bolts were cut when installed originally in 1992. I reused them, no need to cut the ones that came with the toilet. The instructions talked about the waterline in the tank, which is not on the inside of the tank but on the white tube in the middle of the tank. Instructions say don't use galvanized hoses--they are not talking about the newer braided metal hoses, those are ok to use. If you don't crank the tank down, water will go all over when you flush, it is a bit different to use a socket on those 3 plastic nuts that hold the tank in place. Allow extra time for removal of the old one and cleaning up the area before the new installation. Removing the old one is just the reverse steps you will follow for the new installation, except you have to scoop out the water. In my case, the footprint of the old toilet was bigger than the new one, and I had to do some quick floor sanding and staining, sealing in two small places. I lined the area with paper towels to spot leaks for 3 days. Scraper tool helpful for old wax removal. Mansfield Customer Support called me back right away, I couldn't find the water line on the inside of the tank but when I was talking to the technician I saw it on that tube.

Subject: Great Toilet for New Basement Bathroom

Review: Great toilet and a good value. Got the round bowl for tiny basement bathroom addition. Installs easy and flushes great. Best of all it's made in the USA! Not sure why some reviewers are complaining of leaks. When properly installed following the easy to understand directions there are no issues.

The included instructions are complete and straightforward. The toilet complete setup job only took me about 30 minutes once I had removed my old one. I really like the classic modern design and it blended well with the white porcelain tub and sink and the chrome hardware on same. I certainly give this a thumbs up.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easy install with straight forward instructions
Author: Squiggysasquatch
Review: This toilet was easy to install with simple instructions. The design fit our bathroom nicely since it has angled corners on the front of the tank which compliments our neo-angle shower. A few minor inconveniences were the toilet seat had some sharp plastic areas that needed to be trimmed up with a razor blade and the bolts securing the toilet to the floor had to be trimmed down to allow the plastic caps to snap on. See pictures.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Royal flush
Author: Pilotmike
Review: Pleasantly surprised everything came in the box new bolts. seat. wax ring really a quality product took about 30 minutes to install toilet has a super flush seems to be a little bit higher than the old one which is much nicer I would highly recommend this to anybody looking to upgrade to a new toilet Also really like the slow close seat no more banging

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Very poor packaging
Author: Shane
Review: Box was undamaged so i removed the old toilet before completely unboxing this one. After i installed the bowl i opened the tank box and installed tank, to find the lid busted. Too late gotta have a toilet! So i go to install the seat, nope the hinge is broken so for tonight we will have to use the wrong shaped seat from the old toilet. This unit is complete with everything to install and very straightforward installation. Be sure to check all parts before removing your old toilet!!!!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice toilet with a powerful flush
Author: UncleEd
Review: This is a solid toilet, comes with everything you need. It installs very quickly, make sure to tighten all the bolts slowly you don't want to crack anything. The bolts for the back tank are easy and the seat installs with a screwdriver. We Replaced the smaller toilet that originally came in the basement. The elongated bowl and the higher seat makes this a all around nice upgrade.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Complete kit to install
Author: phillytn
Review: Nice toilet and comes with everything for the installation, including soft-close seat. I replaced the wax ring with a reusable silicone seal but wax will work if you'll never have to remove the toilet. Easy to install. Took about 1/2 hour. Nice glazing job. I couldn't find any flaws in the finish. Conventional flushing valve. Fairly quiet operation. About 1" higher seat height than the American Standard toilet that it replaced.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Poor Quality
Author: Jim
Review: I was furnished this product to conduct testing and provide a review. Based on the item I had, I cannot recommend this product. I will caveat this with the fact that I only tested one and it very well could haver been faulty. So check other reviews also to see if others had the same problems. First thing I noticed was a lot of powder that came off of the toilet, so you will want to wipe it off well before bringing it into the house. The porcelain mold also left something to be desired. The instructions were fairly straight forward with diagrams. To test this toilet, I placed it on a level surface, hooked it up to a garden hose, and hooked that up to a standard supply line. The hose water pressure was the same as the interior of the house. The first real issue was with the bowl gasket. It had a grove that should be able to go over a lip on the bowl, but there was no lip. Even with heavy tightening of the bolts, the gasket would not sit right (see photo 1). I even tried to seat it onto the bowl first and it still would not seat well (photo 2). The fill valve was way off from the proper adjustment. The water kept flowing. It took a lot of turns to get the water to the right level. I would have expected the fill valve to at least be close to the right setting. After I set the water level, I added a blue dye so I could see how well the water circulated in the bowl during a flush (Photo 3). It actually did quite well in covering all sides of the bowl (Photo 4). The last issue I had was with the flapper. Most flappers will open up and remain open until the tank is fairly empty. On this tank, I had to hold the handle down during the entire flush in order to empty the tank. Pressing and releasing a second or two resulted in half the tank not emptying (photo 5). This flapper could not go back because the fill tube was in the way (photo 6). Bad design? I try to give every product I test the benefit of the doubt, but unfortunately, if this particular unit is typical of the bulk of the toilets, I just cannot recommend it.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Finally trying a taller toilet
Author: Henry
Review: So our parents have been telling us to get a taller toilet, and how much nicer they are.... well since I had the opportunity to get this toilet, then I made sure to get the taller one to at least make the parents happier when they visit. So the assembly was super easy, maybe cause I have rebuilt and replaced several toilets already. I did like that there is notches to rest against the tank once it is tightened down, making the tank feel more secure. I previously had installed an Danco perfect seal on the floor flange, Item #3844101. This is also the third time I have seated a toilet on this flange so I highly recommend picking up one. They are under all my toilets and make repairs and reinstalls so much easier then having to use a new wax ring. Once the toilet is installed, using wood shims to level, I slide a few paper straps under the toilet and flush repeated to check the seal. After 10 flushes, no water on paper, and I finish the install. The best part is our parents are now happier when they come to visit cause there is a taller toilet in the house.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice toilet
Author: Matt
Review: The toilet itself looks nice. Has a sleek design that elevates the look of the bathroom. Install is simple and comes with all the parts you need. The slow close lid is nice that it’s not loud when shut. I have a couple kids and am constantly asking them not to slam the lid. Nice that it’s not possible now. That said the lid (not the seat) is a little flimsy and I’m not able to sit on it without it bending in. I don’t think it’ll break but I also won’t be testing it. I also found the water refilling noise to be quite loud. I did turn the water down from fully open and that did eliminate it. Good to note if you have higher home water pressure. Other then that it’s been working great. If you’re looking to update the look of an older bathroom this could be a good fit.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Exceptional quality and feel , should last decades
Author: Buzz
Review: First off I was curious how a complete two piece toilet was packaged in a single box. It was packaged real well with abundant cardboard cushioning and placement in the box. So if you have to transport this toilet rest assured it is well packed. Next the toilet tank and lid are in their own box setting on the upside down bowl , the face of the bowl rests on about 1 3/8" of cardboard. The weight of the bowl is impressively heavy, so it should stand up to heavy use by a family. The tank assembly has some very well designed components inside including the 3" flapper assembly . The handle is all metal and should be strong enough to last. The unit comes complete with all mounting hardware and the soft close seat which is made from a long lasting polymer, easy to clean , with a finish that will not degrade. I think that this is a toilet that will satisfy the demands of most homeowners for a long time. It is a ADA compliant comfort height toilet which is a big plus.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: High Quality
Author: Edward
Review: I had never heard of Mansfield before but rest assured this is as good a quality as any of the common names such as Kohler or American Standard. The removal of a 30+ year old round toilet and the installation of this higher, elongated commode was a relatively easy process. I removed all the old wax ring, used my Simple Green to clean the floor and followed the simple instructions. I did adjust the tank level to a lower setting. This is a fast flush unit that will give you two flush cycles on one tank of water. So it is indeed a much more efficient unit than the old one and I think better than our two which are less than five years old. Mansfield even packaged it with a slow close seat and lid....very nice.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Pretty tall toilet
Author: BobC
Review: This ada compliant toilet is pretty tall. My wife is 5’7 and her feet do not lay flat on the floor. I have another comfort height toilet that is a little shorter. Toilet came with bolts and wax ring. Toilet works well after I loosened the flush handle. When I first installed the toilet it would stick in the flush position. I also added a slow close toilet lid.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easiest Install
Author: Dave
Review: This was the easiest replacement I have done. The Toilet comes with everything I needed to replace my existing toilet. The only tools required was a Crescent Wrench, Philip Screw driver and Pliers. i like how simple it was to adjust the water level, there a line on the fill tube. The instruction was easy to follow. Total time to remove and install was less than 2 Hours. Bidet seat will work on this toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Well made toilet. Stylish too.
Author: Rick
Review: The packaging of this unit is exceptional. This was ship to be common carrier and the outside of the box was a little messed up. However, when I open the box all the components were completely intact. No breakage or scratches. This one is a comfort height or chair height. It is approximately17” from the floor to the top of the bowl with the seat up. The quality is apparent right out of the box. The internal flush valve and flapper are quality. The unit is quiet and refill is quick. I am sure this will last a least 40 years or more which is way past my lifetime. Looking for a new quality quiet toilet? Look no further. BUY IT.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good product
Author: Malc07
Review: This came with everything in the box, including the seat! Nice style and everything that you need to install it, the only thing that I found difficult were the instructions! The top tank leaked a little when I installed it but it was soon taken care of! The large nut that holds the inside together was loose, a simple tightening and I was set! Great value and super quiet. Only takes a minute to refill after flushing!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Perfect height
Author: tonyb2760
Review: This is one of the most comfortable height toilets I have had the pleasure of using. It is at the perfect height for comfort. I am just over six feet tall and the one I had before was just too low. It has plenty of flushing power, uses little water and took all but about one hour to install with the tools pictured, including removal and cleanup from the previous toilet. The tank level adjustment is the easiest and simplest designs I have seen. See photo. It's not loud during the flush, but it's not quite either.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good quality toilet
Author: Lj11
Review: This product was shipped to me quickly, and was in perfect condition upon arrival. It was very easy to install, using minimal tools, and it looks great. Let's face it, the toilet isn't necessarily what you want the focal point of your bathroom to be, but it does look nice. I love it's efficient water use, and it does have a very powerful flush! The only thing that prevented me from giving it 5 stars, is that it is significantly loader when flushing then my previous toilet. I believe the difference in noise level is a result of the power of the flush, so keep that in mind when choosing where to install it. We installed it in our quarter bath off our living room, so now when anyone flushes, you can definitely hear it more. All in all, I would recommend this product!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice
Author: Jeff
Review: Pretty nice toilet! Easy to install, especially if you've done one before. Even if you haven't, it's still easy, since all the tank parts are already installed. This is the comfort height, so it's more suitable for taller people. I'm 5'5", but it is in a bathroom that belongs to someone taller then me! Everything you need is included.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Fast to empty and no surprise left behind
Author: Burns
Review: You get what you pay for and Denali has always been synonymous with top quality and the Toilet has delivery completely. The build quality is flawless. From the soft closing lid to appease your significant other to the economical flushes, but still delivers maximum performance so there is no need to flush twice. The high perfect which I personally would call chair height. Easy on easy off. The elongated bowl is mor convenient than the traditional round bowl and accommodate more varying body types. The porcelain is perfectly finished with no sharp edges even where you will not be using. Even item needed for installation is provided except tool and labor. Instillation is pretty straight forward. One person can accomplish this on there own.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Had high hopes for this one
Author: Simon
Review: Doing a remodel of our bathroom and decided to replace the old dated toilet. Always though Mansfield was a top brand so we when with the Denali. Install was a breeze but shortly after it was hooked up I noticed water around the base, thought maybe it was the seal so I replaced it. Same issue! took it off flange and turned it over and notice a hairline crack on the inside of the front of the base. Could clearly see where water was seeping through. So road trip to our nearest Lowes(3.5 hrs round trip to return it and get a replacement. only to find out that the replacement has the same hairline crack in almost the same spot. So packed it back up and made another 3.5 hour road trip but this time we went with an American Standard brand. No leaking from that one.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great for the price!!!
Author: Crice611
Review: Decided to replace my toilet in my garage. Got this one. Very easy to install. Directions were clear and easy to follow. Came with all the parts. Very comfortable. I love the gloss white finish. Flushes very well. Could definitely see myself replacing another with this same exact toilet. Would recommend to anyone

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Over-engineered packaging under engineered product
Author: Ncgater
Review: The positives, seems to flush well. Bottom half is solid. That is about it. Negatives, let's start with the defect, see photo. Very visible and should have been caught at the product inspection stage. I mean, this is the forward facing part of the lid. Next, installation. The flange bolts have to be CUT to fit underneath the caps. Hello, no one has heard of the easy snap-off. Next, the plastic nuts. I mean, you package the product in a $50 box but give me plastic nuts to attach the tank to the base? And the lid. You gonna' buy this? Invest in different toilet seat. You will thank me for this. I mean, this is not a budget toilet. Common' folks!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: I'm buying a different toilet for swap #2
Author: ToeKneeTM
Review: Caught this on sale. This was my first ever toilet swap, so I'm going to give this 2 stars for ease of install ONLY. It really was mostly painless. It was after install that I started disliking this toilet. First, the flushing mechanism sucks. I've had to constantly adjust it to get a full flush. Second, and the BIGGEST gripe is the bowl water dispersion. It is the worst I've ever seen. I spend more time wiping out this bowl than any toilet I've ever used. Lastly, the toilet seat and lid doesn't sit properly and no matter how much I tighten it, it moves. I would NOT buy this toilet, especially for regular price.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good except poor design where tank meets the base
Author: metaljackets
Review: Overall, I like this toilet. It has a very powerful flush, a really nice soft close lid, and good visual appeal. However; I dinged it two stars over one aspect... the design where the tank meets the base. It only utilizes 2 bolts, and they don't provide enough compression. The result is a tank that flexes if pressure is applied to it (such as sitting back to hard). It hasn't leaked, thankfully, but even after adding some rubber tape to stabilize it, there is still some flex, and I'm concerned this will become an issue over time. The toilet I replaced had 3 bolts, and thick rubber compression washers.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Poor cut/seal- excess on lis
Author: Mp07
Review: Bought 3 of these toilets for my home damaged from Hurricane Ida. When finally installing these 2 of the 3 have this excess on the lids. Really frustrating when Im just ready to move home.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Some Lowes, some manufacturing
Author: Steve
Review: First offered off the shelf was an open box. Wax ring was used. Lid busted. Why put it back in stock? Second one. Checked it out. In tact. Started install and realized the tank mounting hardware was gone. Ran to Lowes and they yanked it from the busted unit. All good. Then during tank install I noticed a casting imperfection that those sketchy looking mount bolts would likely not seal. Gorilla sealant on hand I shot that on the mating faces. Here's to hop because I need this toilet up to finish the flooring in another bathroom. Will have to think about the toilet for the next room. I will say the employee was very helpful to sort this out easily

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Randy
Review: I purchased and installed this toilet based on the reviews. The Toilet tank insulation lining is not bonded to the tank on the two sides therefore any contact with the liner in that area will break the liner. Also the tank bolt holes do not line up 100% to the bowel which caused the bolts to be installed on a slight angle which (on the first installation attempt) cause all three bolts to leak. After adding marine silicone to the bolt seals the bolt sealed fine but after filling the tank I found the tank (was cracked which was not cracked during installation). I had to return the toilet and purchased and American Standard with with liner for nearly the same price. The American Standard is is a much better toilet. Don't waste your time with this toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: This toilet is powerful!
Author: Wawa
Review: Color was slightly darker than I was expecting. The sink and tub were a shade and a half lighter, but it’s not an extreme difference.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet for adults!
Author: Kelmar97
Review: Best product we could find in the area. The anti-stain glazing will make a big difference.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Bad toilet or bad retailer?
Author: Willbuyagain
Review: I am now convinced that big box stores sell seconds. If you look at Lowes reviews of Mansfield, Kohler and American Standard you see many of the same quality problems. No wonder they sell for 1/2 of plumbing supply houses. In 8 hours at work my new toilet leaks half the contents of the bowl on my new floor. The toilet obviously has a crack or defect in the trap. I just ordered the same brand from a plumbing supply and when I asked the guy on the phone if the had many problems with that brand, he said "none". Coincidence?

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: LEAKS!
Author: leaktoilet
Review: very poor quality. constant drip at the red gasket between the bowl and tank. does not matter how much or little you tighten. whats up with the groove in the red gasket? piece of garbage. do not bother to call CS . nobody there .

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Extermely difficult to attach tank to bowl
Author: Luke
Review: Can never get the tank to stop leaking from the flange where it attaches to the bowl. This is my first and last mansfield toilet. American Standard has always never leaked for me and flushes much better. Get American Standard toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Surprisingly good
Author: Scotty2Hotty
Review: Just purchased & installed Denali in bone color ar my parents house. It replaced an older,lower 1 piece kohler unit. I wanted to do an American Standard, but none were available in bone/off white & elongated, chair height at my local Lowe's. Other option was a Kohler model, but it had some fancy piston flushing valve system. Saw this Mansfield Denali unit, simple fluid master flush system, reviews looked good, made in USA. So gave it a shot. Packaged extremely well, nothing broke, damaged etc. Quick easy directions Installed real nice & looks great. Flushes like a champ Really glad I gave it a shot

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: This toilet fits with baseboards behind toilet!
Author: PamsMommy
Review: The Denali Elongated Comfort Height toilet is great! We had trouble finding a toilet that would fit in our bathroom because we have a baseboard for heat behind the toilet. We a so needed a toilet in bone because our new tub and sink are both bone. There are not many bone toilets available for purchase in any store. This toilet twas able to fit because it's base footprint is not as long behind the floor bolt as the majoy of toilets being sold. It has a nice powerful flush which is quieter than our previous toilet and uses less water. We love it!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Crack and factory added porcelain over it to seal
Author: Mossey1526
Review: Cracked under the bow; from factory and they tried to seal it. Shame on them for poor quality control. I see why nobody is selling Manfeild anymore. Had to take off drive 30 min and buy a new different company's toilet and it worked perfect. Stay away, avoid this and also it sat crooked even thow floor was level. Terrible experience from a long-time buyer.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield Denali "ELONGATED"
Author: Boogbeer
Review: The install of the tank was a pain the gasket MUST be in place just right or it will leak. The flapper valve doesn't close correctly and leaks and it will stay up and water runs . The seat wasn't the correct seat .. it's an elongated model and they put in a round seat and now I must fight with someone to get me a new seat It does flush nicely

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great functionality
Author: Mpowered
Review: I love the higher seat and the color. Also the slow closing seat is great!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Happy with toilet except...
Author: tipijo
Review: We have been very pleased with this toilet. strong quick flush. no leaks, not hard to install. my only criticism is the tank lid is not flat. there's a slight raised hump in the middle. anything you put on the lid either slides forward or backwards.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Acceptable, water efficient, and made in the USA
Author: ElChupacabara
Review: Well packaged, reasonable price, easy to install, seat does not move, and toilet is sturdy. Solid waste flushes easily, but occasionally requires an extra flush to leave the bowl looking clean. I replaced my 3.6 GPF and would never be able to do a second flush without waiting for it to refill. This tank holds plenty of water so you to make that extra flush without waiting. Make sure to depress the handle completely to activate the refill valve. Of note, the seat is probably going to be a pain to clean the hinge area as its all open and dust and debris will undoubtedly collect.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: 1 out of 2
Author: wise1420
Review: Just recently we had our Guest Bath and Master Suite Bg ath refloored. While doing so we decided to replace the 2 toilets. We purchased 2 Mansfield Denali and proceeded to install while the flooring was being replaced. 1st Denali went well and is performing beautifully. The second Denali did not fair so well. 3 times I had to pull the toilet and replaced the wax ring because its contimued to leak underneath on the left side. I just had a professional come out and after replacing the wax ring for the 4th time he discovered the Denali had a small crack. Very dissapointed and I feel this needs to be replaced. Also the flush lever sticks when you push down and you manually need to pull back or the water will continue to run.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Looks really nice, quick flush 1 gal flush.
Author: Suzy1
Review: I like the height of the toliet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Denali Complete Toilet Package
Author: Derrick522
Review: The Denali WaterSense Elongated Comfort Height 2-Piece Toilet came complete with everything needed to install, to include a new wax ring and slow close seat. The smartheight is ADA compliant which allows for easy sit and stand which helps with arthritic knees. The powerful flush only uses 1.28 gpf which saves on water usage while still emptying the bowl. The slow close seat is really slow, but at least it doesn’t slam shut. The tank fill is rather quiet and easy to adjust. All and all, I am happy with this toilet and am glad that I don’t have sit so low.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Shop around.
Author: twayne
Review: The 3 toilets that I purchased came with the cheapest seats I have ever seen. That is a shame as the toilets themselves looked like great quality.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Check item before purchasing
Author: Patriick
Review: This toilet was broken in several pieces had to return it and get another one why was the broken one on the floor for sale?

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Made in U.S.A.!
Author: jlsonic
Review: First, I was appalled that "American Standard" toilets are made in Mexico! Denali are made in Ohio, by a company founded in the 1920's that employs hundreds of people in a small town. The Denai toilet if very well made, with a very powerful flush as promised! My plumber had little trouble installing it. Should anything go wrong inside, it should be easy to fix. The price was only about twenty dollars more than "American Standard"'s equivalent model. I am happy to pay just a bit more to support American workers and Made in U.S.A. products.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Sharon
Review: I am very aggravated at the flushing. It doesn't get all the debris off the walls of the toilet and it seems I am going to have to clean the toilet after every use. It's not appealing to enter the bathroom and have to see fragments left on the side of the bowl from the person who used it before you. previous toilet was 40 years old and never had this problem Seems like the water line is not high enough to cleanse it when flushed or not enough water coming down all around the upper part to wash away debris.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Don't purchase this toilet!!!!
Author: Denny
Review: So tank bolts are not rubberized enough and the tank has been leaking since I got it,from the tank are fastened to the bowl. I had to go buy a different set of bolts for a Kohler toilet. It flushes okay it has enough power but they tried to cheap out on things like tank bolts which is very important.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Not white and looks and feels cheap
Review: The toilet is an off white color, does not match the rest of the white fixtures and even doesn't match the color of the included seat. The seat its self is cheap, feels flimsy and doesn't fit correctly. For a $200 price tag I would expect more.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Comfortable
Author: Mkw1

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Highly disappointed...
Author: Grif
Review: I never write reviews of anything, anywhere. But, this disappointment of a toilet has drawn me in. I thought this toilet was going to be great. Loved the made in USA aspect. However, it's lousy. First, the flapper falls way too fast, forcing you to hold the handle down for the flush duration. I have tried adjusting the foam float and the chain, but no matter what, if you push the handle and let it go, the flapper immediately falls and shuts. The instructions provide NO guidance on how to tune the flush. Second, the seat it comes with is garbage. If you stand to urinate, the seat falls down while you are going. Luckily, it's a slow fall, so you can catch it midstream, if you are quick! That or it slowing falls through the stream, rather than quickly passing through! Third, the flush is weak. Even holding the handle down the whole time, it is poor. No comparison to the American Standard (made in Thailand unfortunately) we have in the other bathroom. Pass on this toilet!!! After a week of use, I am considering pulling it and trying to get a refund or at least writing Lowes to try and get credit for a replacement seat and an adjustable fall rate flapper.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
