Review: This looks better in person and is so well made. Comes with the seat and lid. Both slowly close themselves. Great value. I ordered it online and was delivered to my house.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Quality Toilet and Company, Must Hold Handle down
Author: avdoc
Review: Likes: Mansfield customer service was awesome. I called and spoke with them twice while deciding on purchasing this and they were very helpful. It's pretty (no logos on it anywhere, my wife likes handle on the side) and is solidly built/heavy. The flush is very strong when you hold the handle down (see dislikes) and it has anti-stick coating like other higher-end brand toilets. I chose it over similar American Standard (Champion) and Kohler (Cimmaron) toilets available at Lowes because these toilets have serious quality control issues (cracking and issues with flush valves, respectively). I did NOT use the included wax ring but instead used the Danco 4.75-in Toilet Wax Ring with Bolts Item #: 3844101 Model #: 10826X which I highly recommend as this allows you to reposition toilet if needed and it's a very secure fit on this toilet. Dislikes: You must hold the handle down to get a good flush. I talked to Mansfield about this and it's the way it's designed. The flapper they have doesn't float at all. I have purchased a new flapper to try from HomeDepot (Fluidmaster Universal 3 in. Premium Adjustable Toilet Flapper) that I'm hoping will allow for a good flush without holding the handle down. The flush is loud and the flapper slams down hard if you don't hold the handle down long enough. Also, it takes a long time for the tank to fill after flushing and it's louder than our previous toilet-most of the water goes into the bowl and not the tank. My wife feels the toilet sits a little high, but I'm fine with it-we're the same height so personal preference. Overall I'm pretty happy with the toilet and was VERY impressed with Mansfield's customer service. I had a hard time finding any information about this toilet before I bought, so I'm hoping this review helps other people decide on it.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Compact design.
Author: Bernie
Review: The "Pro-Fit White WaterSense Round Standard Height 2-Piece Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size" is made in China. T he box has all the instructions clearly printed on it plus an "Installation Guide book" inside. The only problem I had was securing the Tank to Bowel, the first time did exactly what the instructions said and it leaked badly. Problem is the Rubber Head Bolts did not properly seal. Pulled it apart and applied Sealant to Rubber bolt heads and followed instructions as per book. This time it sealed.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Thoughtfully prepared
Author: Ritt
Review: Let me preface this article with how much I despise plumbing projects. This one was no exception, what should have been a two hour project took almost three times as long. First remove the old toilet only to find the flange is destroyed and will take ingenuity and lots of work. Many hours later I have the new flange and wax ring (provided with this toilet) in place ready for installation. This toilet bolted in very easily but I had to use plastic connector bolt different from the ones provided. These were recommended by a plumber when I was addressing the broken flange issue. I went to connect the toilet to the water supply but alas they did not provide that water line. Trying to reuse the old one it broke because part of it was plastic. It took three trips to Lowe’s to get the correct new shut-off valve and water fill line. Mostly my fault for not trying the connection at the store. The best part of this whole installation was the toilet itself, in the past I would have had to install the guts of the toilet myself adding time and expense. While this is only the third toilet I have ever installed it was by far the easiest. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to install a new toilet. I did spend a bit of time hunting for the plastic bolts for the seat, and finally decided to use the old ones figuring that they were not shipped or that I had misplaced them. After the new seat was installed I lifted the lid to conduct a test flush only to find the new plastic bolts taped conveniently to the underside of the lid.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Easiest Toilet Install Yet
Author: BuilderBob
Review: I installed this new toilet in my pool room. The original toilet was 38 years old and a high-water-use type toilet. I had previously installed three other toilets in other bathrooms in the house. This toilet was the easiest to install, but that is largely because there weren't any issues with the flange or flooring flatness (no shims required) like in the other rooms. The kit contained everything I needed. Sometimes if things aren't so square, you'll need shims to level the toilet and possibly a problem-solver seal, rather than the supplied wax ring. The only non-obvious part of the install was the plastic rings that hold the plastic dome caps that cover the mounting bolts for the bottom portion of the toilet. I had to put on my glasses to see that they are marked with "this side up" text. As a tip, I used some tools on the floor as guides as to where the flange bolts were as I lowered the base down onto the flange seal. I have included a photos of what I'm speaking of for clarity. The longest part of the install was cleaning around the area, which is typical in my experience. The flush works well, but not quite as powerful as a toilet costing three times as much. For the pool room, this will be just fine.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION
Author: Cabman
Review: Kind of hard to get excited about a toilet, but the install on this was a breeze. Instructions were simple and the rubber-headed tank bolts create a great seal. That said, a few things to keep in mind: 1. Buy an extra wax ring. If you’ve had a remodel that includes granite or marble flooring, odds are good the supplied ring won’t be thick enough to create a good seal. Having a second ring will allow you to double the depth. Wax rings run about $2.00, so go ahead and splurge—it could save you a trip back to the store; 2. When attaching the tank, you’ll need to stretch the rubber gasket a bit to seat it flush to the bottom of the tank. The instructions are a bit vague on that, and you’ll be going through a couple of towels if you don’t! The toilet itself is pretty good. The oblong shape is far more comfortable than traditional round bowls. A quick flick of the handle drains about half the tank (thereby conserving water) and holding the handle down will completely drain it (for when a little more oomph is needed). What I like best is that the tank is very quiet when refilling. All said, a good product that’s easy to install.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Good quality with simple install!
Author: LtSmash31
Review: We installed this toilet to replace the chair height one that was in our spare bath when we got the house. The chair height is just too high in a bathroom used primarily by our younger kids (6+). Overall, this toilet is a toilet. I hit the flush lever and it flushes. That's what I need it to do and it does it well. Waste goes away when I hit flush...that's a win. For install, it went smoothly. Removed the old toilet, cleaned the old wax off the flange, then began installing the new toilet. I only have one criticism...the hardware kit that comes with the toilet doesn't have the nice little plastic washers to help hold the flange bolts up while you install the bowl. You can see in pic #3 where I used small pieces of cardboard to hold the bolts up. It works, but it wouldn't be too much to ask for Mansfield to include simple, cheap, thin plastic washers to hold the bolts up. Other than that, install was smooth. Got the bowl installed then put the tank on the back. After that, I connected the water feed, turned on the water, and checked for leaks...there were none! It was a smooth install and the toilet does exactly what a toilet should. The waste goes away and I know I have a quality toilet that is going to last!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Solid budget toilet
Author: movenu
Review: This is a nice looking, fairly easy to assemble toilet. It works well and comes with everything needed for installation and use except the toilet supply line (most toilets don't include that). Flushing pressure is very good but not great. It could be a little better. This toilet also sits pretty low. I am not sure if there is a higher / chair height available. Everything else is pretty standard and fits well. On the back of the tank lid there is a sticker with the names and serial numbers for all replacement parts which I have not seen on a toilet before and is a smart addition.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Easy Install, Looks Great
Author: Hank
Review: First off, the toilet had easy to read instructions in the box and on the box. Installation was very straight forward. The instructions said to tighten the three tank bolts two turns past hand tight. I did hand tight believing it was enough, but it seeped some. I did the two turns as called for and problem solved. The elongated design looks really good and sits quite comfortably. The tank plumbing worked great and no adjustment was needed. The seat was also an easy install. The flush is robust and cleans the bowl well. All the necessary hardware was included. The only downside is that the height seemed a little low for me; but I'm 6'5 tall. All in all, a very nice toilet that was easy to install, looks great good and works well.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Fantastic! Quality toilet. Hardware in box!
Author: Mike
Review: This is a Mansfield, ceramic, water efficient toilet. Easy install. One socket and a screwdriver is all I needed. Everything I needed for a toilet swap, was in the box. All bolts, nuts and gaskets, including new seat, hardware, wax ring, flange bolts and caps are all in the box. Installation time including taking out the old toilet was less than an hour. After Installation, I turned on the water and the float was even set to the right water level. I am happy with this product and would highly recommend.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Great look, easy install
Author: dziggy
Review: This toilet looks great. Bright white in color and fits small bathroom well. Install was easy and as long as you take your time, should go in right on the first attempt. Parts were able to be installed by hand with minimal wrench tightening. I would recommend the wax less seal (bought separately) as they are less messy and easier to adjust without damage. Water flow is quiet on refill and water usage is minimal. All in all. An excellent choice.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Light weight easy to install.
Author: Jim
Review: This toilet came with everything needed and ready to go. The tank is smaller so less water waste. The bowl is smooth and will be easy to clean. In stall was quick and easy came with everything needed except new water line. The plastic seat and lid seem a little to commercial so I will be replacing that. Comes with bees wax gasket to seal toilet to the flange in the floor. This toilet bowl has three holes at the tank attachment be careful not to over tighten here or were it mounts to the floor because it is Ceramic glass and will break if you apply too much torque pressure on the bolts and nuts. So be careful! All and all though this is a great toilet flushes good and is clean and white. I would recommend this product to you.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Worth every penny and then some.
Author: Mbrown
Review: I got tired of my 80s American Standard "quiet flush" toilet with its embarassing useless flush. Every bathroom time was frought with anxiety. Sometimes having to fetch a bucket of water to finish the job. Enter the Mansfield Pro-Fit 1. With its American made fully glazed siphon assist trap, this toilet will handle even the largest jobs with ease! Comes with every nut, bolt, seal and fastener required for installation. For the price of a mediocre night out you can also have this confidence inspiring flush in your life. Buy Mansfield and there'll be no regrets! Here's a video of the flush. https://youtube.com/shorts/E1gmvF5a6iI?feature=share

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Would Buy Again
Author: Bill
Review: THE GOOD: Nice looking, good price, Fluid Master fill valve, toilet tank wax seal & hardware is included. The toilet has a large jet at the bottom that helps push waste to the drain (see photo). THE NEUTRAL: The flapper has a unique design as the hole on one side is larger than the hole on the other side. Not a big deal as Lowe's sells the Mansfield flapper (item # 4133941). If you care to upgrade to a better flapper, you will greatly increase your flush performance (Lowe's item # 4133941), see photo. The Fluid Master fill valve comes with a flow restrictor which means that it takes a long time to refill the tank after each flush. Instructions for removing the flow restrictor can be found my Googling "How to remove the toilet fill valve regulator." COULD BE BETTER: There are no rubber washers or spacers used to level & support the tank as you secure it to the toilet. After failing to get a good seal, I placed 3 tank toilet washers on top of each of the 3 holes on the toilet, then I placed the tank on the toilet (see photo). The Lowe's item # on the tank washers is 3625389. The tank was immediately level and stable, and the seal was perfect. Overall the Mansfield toilet is a quality product at a good price. If you add the rubber tank washers as spacers, you don't have to worry about porcelain to porcelain contact as the tank to toilet washer is compressed by the weight of the water in the tank. As stated, you can upgrade to the other brand flapper and greatly improve your flush performance.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Good product for the price
Author: mamaj
Review: I was looking for a no frills toilet to replace my original '80s toilet that used way too much water per flush. I installed a taller toilet in my other bathroom for my daughter who is 4" taller than me. Needed a lower one for myself. Super easy to install. The hardware, toilet seat and flush lever handle are pretty flimsy plastic but easy to replace. The bolt cap covers are not deep enough to snap over the bolt. I used an extra think wax ring but maybe i should have doubled up instead. Not sure if that would help but minor issue. Good quick flush for #1, hold down for #2...a bonus water saving feature I was not aware of.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: What you expect from something American made
Author: afaucher8788
Review: For a DIY type person this was very easy to install. Having everything needed in the box for install is great. The toilet seat is kind of cheap and thin and doesn't feel overly durable. I'd you've never installed a toilet using the directions in reverse to remove the existing toilet is extremely helpful. The tank bolts having built in gaskets was amazing and made it very easy to seat the tank and not worry that it was going to leak. Very happy with this product overall.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In

I can hear some water now and then, so we'll see if that normalizes by days end. Overall, it's a right on tome replacement for our broken toilet.

Somewhat of a water saver due to it's smaller tank. Just a regular flapper design flush system. Works fine and a good value.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In

Review: Very nice. Quiet flush. Adjustable full valve is a nice feature. I did replace the seat though, simply because I prefer a wooden seat. Great product! I recommend this one!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Author: George
Review: Extremely disappointed with this toilet .I saw the good reviews and bought it but the the flushing power is so weak that you have to flush 2 times just to flush things out .Never again buying mansfield .

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Only choice available. Poor performance
Author: JackDW
Review: I was purchasing new toilets for my daughter. Due to young children, needed standard height. This is the only one that Lowes had in stock. There were stacks and stacks of other Toilets, but all others were taller chair height. Why does Lowes not consider families with young children. While installation was easy and everything fit with no leaks, I am very disappointed with the performance. You have to flush at least twice to flush the bowl. A huge waste of water. Claims to be a water saver but if you have to flush multiple times, does not save water. At least it was in stock, installed easily and most important does not leak. Will work until she can get ones that flush better.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Author: TexasMama
Review: My teens kept telling me the toilet was clogged, but it wasn't, they just weren't holding the handle down long enough. It's at a point though where multiple people keep doing this and I'd have to put up a tacky sign telling people to press and hold to flush. No thank you. It has a weak flush and doesn't seem to flush all the way out. The handle is plastic and feels cheap. It's comfortable to sit on though and install was easy. I do prefer elongated and standard height (I'm 5'3" so chair height doesn't let my feet fully touch the ground) but I will be returning this toilet for a different one. That's how annoying this flush is. I'm literally going to take this dang thing back for a different one.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Almost flawless install
Author: ERKco
Review: Install for the most part was fast and easy. Only two problems, and both were with the T bolts holding the toilet to the floor. First, the T bolts had a tendency to fall over when setting the bowl over them since there was nothing to hold them up. I used a small piece of cardboard pushed over them to hold them up. The next problem, and the bigger of the two, the T bolts were too long. The finishing caps wouldn't fit because the hit the end of the T bolts. Had to use a hack saw to cut them down to fit. Either supply longer caps to fit over the bolts, or supply shorter bolts.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Easy to install out of the box, and works great
Author: Smitty
Review: The only thing that I had to put together was the tank, and it was easy to install after that

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Porcelain is OK, plastic parts are cheap
Author: Mark A
Review: I had two problems with this toilet. The plastic hinge for the seat/lid broke the very first time I sat on the toilet. I sat on the closed lid as I was putting a new roll of toilet paper on the wall. As I leaned slightly to one side the hinge snapped. I removed the seat and used the seat/lid from my old toilet. Also, fill valve to which the water supply hose connects to was broken. I suspect someone had previously purchased and returned this unit, or maybe it was just broken from the factory, but not wanting to remove and return the installed toilet, I just used the flush mechanism from my old toilet to replace the broken new one. Everything works and looks fine now, but I should not have had to supplement this NEW toilet with two parts from my old toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Author: bubba
Review: I do not recommend purchasing this product. This toilet was supposed to come with the whole kit with wax ring and bolts to install the toilet. None of the kit items were included in the package so I had to go buy the parts to install it. The seat of the toilet is also made out of uncomfortable cheap plastic.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Parts Missing!
Author: Homeowner
Review: While installing, found the flange nuts were not included. Was able to reuse my old ones for now. Perhaps more important was that the new flange bolts were present. Package did include an extra set of caps (which do me no good). Just purchased a second toilet to install today. This "kit" is also missing the flange nuts but more frustrating is the flange bolts are missing as well! I am not going to assume my old bolts are OK and I am not going to get the old toilet removed to find out then. It looks like I need to make another trip back into town, buy my own nuts and bolts along with using $10 in gas before I can start this project. I was happy to purchase something "made in USA" but I am very disappointed that the people packaging these so called "kits" can't do a better job. Somebody on the assembly line needs a pep talk.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Crappy
Author: Beez
Review: This is the only toilet I could find that meets my dimensions to fit in my bathroom, it has the most uncomfortable seat I've sat on. The whole thing leaks unless you use a ratchet on the plastic nuts and tighten them until it feels like something is about to break.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Reasonable
Author: Norseman
Review: Easy to install standard height toilet at a reasonable price

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: I would spend the extra money for a better one
Author: Bradlybad40
Review: We have two of these in our home and both are not very good at getting waste off the inside wall. After going I typically have to clean the bowl because the design is such that the water won't push it,or clean it off the interior bowl. More work than it's worth

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Not the greatest
Author: basstbn
Review: I have two of these toilets, and compared to other toilets from the same price range I have installed, these are not the best. The tank bolts are worthless - no matter how carefully you tighten them, they WILL LEAK until you use silicone around them, so save yourself the problem and tighten them fully then silicone them. As for use, one of these has been in service for nearly two years. Frankly, if any other toilet had been in stock, I would not have bought a second one. The first one will plug up at the drop of a hat, so keep a plunger handy. The even better part is the shape of the outlet in the bottom of the bowl doesn't allow the plunger to completely seal, so it's quite difficult to clear once it gets plugged. I have taken the first one out multiple times to be sure there wasn't something stuck, and the entire passageway is clear. I'd say faulty design. The newest one is in a guest bathroom, so it seldom gets the "workout" that the main toilet sees.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Great toilet 5'4" tall people
Author: Tried2Help
Review: I am 5'8" tall and my sweetheart is 6'4". I selected this toilet as a replacement for the top flushing toilet my youngest was having problem pushing the button. The toilet is too short for us at our height, but worked perfectly and installed quickly. We kept it for 4 days before my knees complained. Now, I just let him handle things, I was trying to help, but this toilet is perfect for children or those who are closer to the floor. Not for tall people at all. Good look, sturdy.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: This was one of the models made in the USA.
Author: Keith
Review: I like that the trap and outlet size are big enough to not get clogged so easily.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Didn't flush clean!
Author: Joe vh
Review: I prefer standard height, elongated bowls, but they're hard to find. This looks good. Installs easily enough. However, it didn't flush clean. I replaced the low flow Flapper with a better one and put on a solid soft close seat and now it's good.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: This toilet has been one nightmare after another
Author: Savanna
Review: Needed to get a new toilet and I picked this one out because it was the closest one to the one I had home…nothing but issues since putting it in first the back bolt leaked so had to caulk it the found a small crack in the tank had to caulk it… then it wouldn’t stop trying to fill up….then get all the above working great and then the seal or gasket between the tank and the toilet is leaking replace it and it still leaking as of right now caulk that also to see if will stop the leak about to really say screw it and go spend the money on a new toilet

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Cheap
Author: Donald
Review: Had to replace the float ball to get it to flush without holding the handle down. The float ball is an odd size 3”.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Can't flush a golf ball, maybe a marble!
Author: CollernW
Review: I liked that it was available, not many standard size toilets available due to supply chain issues. That was the only benefit of this toilet. The toilet bowl evacuation hole is very small compared to most other toilets, making it clog very quickly. Plastic tank fittings seemed cheap and may leak sooner than later.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Rough installation
Author: Josh
Review: I highly recommend attaching the tank to the bowl before setting the bowl to the ground. The tank connects to the bowl with three screws instead of the standard two, with one in the back. This nut is almost impossible to tighten once the bowl is attached to the ground, putting this nut against the wall.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Disappointing - Flush is very weak
Author: Mark
Review: Followed instructions - installation was easy enough but I would not recommend this toilet. The flush is very weak, you will need to flush at least twice to clean out a #2. I tried messing with the water levels etc. but nothing worked. Look for a toilet that has a much better flush/flow.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Functional replacement & lower bowl height.
Author: WC2021
Review: Install went smoothly. The bowl rear portion was not cast completely square/level, so I have some tilt with the tank installed. Not noticeable in the water closet its installed in. If I had the time to uninstall & return, I would. We wanted a lower bowl height & not many instore options.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Author: railroad
Review: it's a pc of junk, doesn't clear the bowl w 1 flush, rubber headed bolt was stripped new out of the pkg. finish discoloring within 30 days.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Nice Toilet, but tank to toilet leaks
Author: HandymanDan
Review: Just installed this toilet today and it was an easy install. The tank to toilet securing bolts (3) have a nice hard rubber non-round head on them for easy gripping. Problem: The rubber head did not cover the bolt hole entirely, almost, but not quite. Consequently, it leaked pretty bad. I had them as tight as I could get them without cracking the toilet, but still leaked. I fussed for several hours including another trip to LOWES to fix the leak. After I got the leak under control, I appreciated how it flushed. Very nice. In my opinion, the tank mounting hardware needs rethinking, but I'm still buying a second one! I would give this toilet 5 stars easy if the tank mounting hardware worked.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Inexpensive but works well
Author: Pragmatic740
Review: Be careful when installing to make sure the three bolts holding the tank to the base are tightened evenly, otherwise the thank will lean forward or backward and leak.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: great choice
Author: kass
Review: I am so glad I decided on this toilet. It was easy to install and had everything included. great price ,made in USA..and the flush is powerful .well worth $129

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: clogs easily
Author: dissatified
Review: bought this to replace a 30 year old toilet that startedleaking at the tank. after 7 weeks it has plugged completely twice and has to be plunged weekly.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: More than does the job, easy to install / assemble
Author: Geoff
Review: Easy to assemble, does the job, nice looking. Not the highest quality parts (plastic). The seat cover is a bit warped, but not a deal breaker.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: So far so good
Author: Jenny
Review: The bowl and seat size is perfect for my height. In addition you don’t have to flush multiple times. Awesome in saving water consumption.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: New John
Author: Ben
Review: Purchased to replace my dad’s old toilet. Was happy that everything needed was in the box in good condition. Did purchase a new flex water line.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Good quality at a reasonable price.
Author: Ak51
Review: Good quality toilet. Quiet. The seat does not wobble. Easy to install.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Author: Sid24
Review: Very disappointed with this toilet .I wanted a standard height,elongated toilet and since there weren't many options out there I decided to go with this one however the seat isn't soft close and the flush power is so weak that you need to flush it 2 times to flush everything out.Wouldn't recommend.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Loving my new toliet
Author: Fanes
Review: Fit perfectly in the spot. Flushs nicely. The only think i dont care for is the flush knob is plastic

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Horrible toilet
Author: Joyce
Review: I absolutely hate this toilet. I had to immediately buy a replacement seat because the other was so uncomfortable. It makes a loud clunk when flushed. The plummer said there was nothing he could do to fix that. And it plugs often. Worse decision I have made!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Good toilet
Author: Contractor
Review: Good solid toilet, with duel flushing ability. Quick flush for liquid, use less water, with a stronger flush for solids. Easy to install, includes wax ring, mounting bolts, bolt covers. The seat could be a little heavier, but it works OK.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Great price.
Author: Mr.Fixit
Review: Replaced a toilet in our powder room and didn't want to spend a fortune and I didn't need anything fancy. This was a good choice. The one I Replaced was 14 1/2" high to the top of bowl. This was an inch higher an that was fine.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: ONLY 15INCHES HIGH!!
Author: Sad customer
Review: Very low sitting bowl

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Good Product
Author: Jerry
Review: Yesterday, I removed my old commode and installed the new Pro-Fit from Mansfield commode. The installation of the new commode was easy as the tank parts were already installed and they stayed in place and caused no trouble during the installation. Everything went in the proper place and I only had one tank bolt that caused a little leak at first. I kept adjusting until it stopped. The only reason I'm giving it a four is for two reasons. The toilet seat is a cheap version and probably won't last very long. The other reason is the toilet isn't tall enough. I think the tall version is 17 inches high (Not sure of that). As I'm now 77 years old and finding difficulty in getting up and down, I see this as a potential problem. But, overall, the commode is a good product and well worth what it sales for. I'm satisfied with it and would recommend it.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: 2021 Defect
Author: Smada5
Review: We bought this Mansfield toilet primarily for price and it was American made. You should be aware of the 2021 manfufacturing defect which refers to a front bowl leak. It was properly installed the first time with ease but leaked in the front part (enough to pool over night). Husband thought it was the wax ring and bought another one, same thing happened a leak. We live 40 min from our store so taking back was a consideration but a call to Mansfield was made first. After a lengthy back and forth and accusatory of not installing it properly we were told it was a defect and we could exchange for another one because that was our choice, I just want you to know that this is a possibility when purchasing this, why would we take another chance with this toilet if it's a known problem? You have one job before sending it out to stores to check for leaks. Anyway I wouldn't recommend the risk or hassle of hauling it home for it to leak. Mansfield summit Round White. Lowe's allowed the return and we went with American Standard and no problem with first time installation.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: terrible seat
Author: Ev Lew
Review: nice height, good flush. terrible seat, you will want to replace the seat

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Best value on the shelves at Lowe's
Author: Capt W
Review: To me, this is the best value on the shelves at Lowe's. Solid, made-in-USA product with Fluidmaster internals means it's going to last. I replaced a 20-year-old Crane toilet and the process was seamless. I was admittedly a bit leery about the "smart fastener" tank-to-bowl fasteners, but they worked as advertised. Although this unit comes with all needed parts, I used the Fluidmaster wax-free base seal, which mated perfectly to this unit. I would definitely buy this unit again -- and it's only a few bucks more than the Chinese-made budget models.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: The plastic seat is most uncomfortable.
Author: guest4use
Review: This was a major improvement to an older toilet, but I do not like the plastic seat, which I will replace.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Total waste of money
Author: NIKKI
Review: Less than 3 months old and already has a chip in the toilet bowl. Clogs very easily. A piece of crap! Pun intended

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Complete toilet
Author: Frank
Review: Everything needed to install toilet included. Previous Mansfield toilet very reliable.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: It's a toilet
Author: rbockman
Review: Looks like a toilet, installed fairly easily, it does what a toilet does, find nothing special about it, doesn't flush well, have to hold the flush handle down to completion to get a complete flush, unimpressive, plastic flush handle, giving it a cheap look. If I had known about the poor flush I would have bought a different brand.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Dependable basic toilet
Author: Freddy Fixall
Review: The best description for this model falls under your basic no-frills commercial-style dependable toilet, nothing fancy. This toilet is not the fanciest design-wise but it is user-friendly and plumber-friendly. You will always find replacement flappers or fill valves down the road when they need to be replaced. Mansfield is a reputable company, and I have installed many of their different models of toilets for over 30 years with no problems. It would have scored five stars if the toilet had been more stylish.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Toilet Broken
Author: Zelaufey
Review: We bought it at the store then install it open the box broken! End up returning it.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Author: Charlie1414
Review: All in all the toilets were installed properly one tank had a crack and you guys replaced it with no problems. This was a very smooth and good outcome. We are very pleased with these new toilets. Thank you.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Do not purchase this product
Author: Londi
Review: Very cheaply made, instructions were terrible, bolt to lock the seal in broke off in the floor, had to spend more money out to get that removed. Toilet eventual went to habitat for donation unused.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Have to Hold Down Handle
Author: TolietProbs
Review: Cost is good but I have to hold down the handle for 2-4 seconds for it to fully flush. It will not "flush" for me by quickly hitting the lever. 2-4 may not sound like alot time, but over years it is. My Plumber told be the majority of toliets these days will require us to hold down the handles becuase government regulations in place to force me to save water. So if I want full longer flush Im going to have to hold handle down longer, wasting precious time, saving water I guess.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Do not buy this toilet
Author: AGLaugh
Review: We purchased this toilet last night. The bolts attaching the tank to the bowl are dripping. We purchased new nuts and bolts and it is still dripping. The wax ring that came with the toilet failed. We had to purchase a new wax ring and replace it. Don’t purchase this unless you plan to make multiple extra trips to the store to replace all the included parts that don’t work.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Nice quality
Author: S1559
Review: Was easy to install and came with everything that was needed.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Warranty term
Author: Customer
Review: We bought this toilet 2 months ago, installed it for use in the guest rest room, so it was used only a few times since installation. There is a leak last week, we called the plumber, they said that the toilet was broken and should be replaced the whole, not only the wax ring. What will be the warranty of this toilet? It does not mention anywhere!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Great but....
Author: Mers
Review: Installation was easy enough finding all the required parts inside the box. However we found it infuriating installing a round toilet bowl to get to the last step of putting on the toilet seat cover only to see that it is an elongated bowl seat!! Don't know how this can happen and not going to un-install an entire toilet to change out the toilet seat cover but completely frustrating and would like to know how this could be resolved!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Does the job
Author: MarkER
Review: Easy Install, realistically it is a basic toilet that does the job. Came with all parts needed including wax ring. Bolts did need to be ground down to size to allow the caps to fit, which was an inconvenient extra step. The product that I got looks to be refurbished, and the toilet itself had a repair patch on the underside. Despite the repair the toilet works as designed, however I don't think this is acceptable practice.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Not white, bolts leak even with different washers
Author: Anonymous
Review: I'm assuming I can't return it at this point, but the toilet I ordered said white and this one was beige out of the box. The bowl installed well and is sealed, however, the "patent pending tank bolts" leak. I even replaced these bolts with separately bought bolts, and it is still leaking. Not sure what is going on there. I would return it, but I am assuming that I cannot at this point since the bowl has been installed.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: terrible
Author: nick
Review: I have had so many issues with this toilet. The seal for the tank isn't working properly. Any slight pressure on the tank will make it leak from it. No matter how hard tou tighten the bolts, it does nothing to stop it from happening. The base of the toilet wasn't seating right, and come to find out, it was warped. Don't buy this toilet. You're better off with an American standard, project source or any other brand.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Poor packaging!!!!
Author: Julie
Review: The first toilet that I picked up was cracked at the base. I brought it back, was exchanged for a new toilet...and that one had a hairline crack in the tank that didn't become obvious until the unit was completely installed.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Everything you need
Author: Gavin
Review: Everything you need is in this kit. The only other thing I bought was a supply line, but that is more dependent on your current plumbing. Instructions were clear to follow. Mounting the tank with the included three bolts worked well. There weren't any leaks like other reviews mentioned. Making sure all three bolts are tightened the same amount was key.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: works unlike Orange man that don't honor quality
Author: honost
Review: like the fact it works but slightly more than the competitor which I refuse to use ever again

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Basic toilet looks great works great.
Author: LetsGoBrandon1
Review: That is comes with everything except a new water line. And that it is made in the USA!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Order a seat separately
Author: Bigthumb78
Review: The toilet basin is fine. The enclosed seat is the worst kind of basic plastic.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: It is a B+ rating for me
Author: Cleo
Review: Very hard and uncomfortable seat. Will have to replace seat.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: The toilet leaks lots of water
Author: user1711
Review: The size and high of the toilet is really good. The instructions for installation were not clear, but even then I was happy with the purchase. The problem comes around two months after the purchase, every time we flush water goes for up to five to ten minutes, we have to manually arrange it. it is very disappointing.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Buy better!
Author: Dixie
Review: Has a flimsy plastic seat/lid. I had my old toilet replaced because it was constantly running but in 10 years I had never had to use a plunger, in the week I’ve had this installed I had to blow the dust off the plunger because it’s not the quality of the old one! Bite the bullet and buy a more quality product.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Quality made in the USA
Author: WeLoveQuality
Review: The Mansfield toilet we bought at Lowe’s fits perfectly in our small bathroom. It has the features we want (few do these days): standard, not chair height; and round bowl, not elongated. Also, it is priced much less than Kohler and other brands, yet is quality made in the USA. We're very happy with Mansfield!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Very affordable and sizeable
Author: Buckchinnyjoeyogreratter
Review: It’s totally amazing perfect for my miniature bathroom. It’s styilish and looks amazing with my chunky white walls. Beautiful. 4\5 it’s thick and long enough and the hole is perfect so the water don’t splash when I do bowel movements. It’s also thunkly sizeable and encourages me to flush the toilet more.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: You get what you pay for
Author: KellyinOhio123
Review: Unfortunately needed a smaller toilet at a specific height to be able to get a ADA toliet chair over. This was the only one that met those specific needs. I’ve never needed a toilet plunger before and had to run out to buy one. Unfortunately it gets used almost daily since the toilet gets clogged easily.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Worth the money.
Author: Poinky
Review: Toliet was easy to install and was a great price. Would buy again.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: It's OK
Author: Tanya
Review: I purchased this toilet for my bathroom suite. My only issue with this toilet is the tank level was weak. It was stripped and its loose and hanging off. I have to go buy another one.. if anyone had this issue tell me which lever you had to get. The plastic seemed cheap!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Great look and everything included .
Author: Rick
Review: Needed a new toilet. This toilet was an easy installation with everything included. The only thing I would improve on is a better seat.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: could be engineered better
Author: Lucas
Review: Everything was fine except the engineering aspect. The closet has 3 bolts that fixes it to the bowl. 2/3 were hard to reach and if you do not tighten them down equally, the closet will not be level. All other aspects of this toilet were OK

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: It only seats one at a time.
Author: SAS6
Review: It's good for sitting. I like to sit on it. My family does too. But not together. That would be weird.

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In
Subject: Smaller than most others- great for kids and those
Author: LowesMom
Review: Good replacement toilet from the old worn out one we had. It flushes great- lots of power-It's a bit smaller than most, so anyone taller should pass on this one- but great for kids!

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In

Product_name: Mansfield Pro-Fit White Round Standard Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In

Author: Tigger and when he Pooh
Review: I liked the highs, and the flush was exceptional!!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Just bad
Author: Dave
Review: I am a commercial plumber and have installed hundreds of toilets for my paycheck. Bought this because I needed a 10” rough toilet and this is made in the USA and figured it was probably a superior product. Well, the build quality and performance is bad, very bad. The tank to bowl setup will not seal water tight after four attempts so I will be returning it. The finish on the lower edge of the tank has evident drips in the porcelain creating an unfinished look. The flushing system is complete gar...

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: It's clearly not white
Author: Kirt
Review: This toilet is not white. Sink on the right is white (see photo). The toilet is maybe bone or a very light sand color. I haven't even hooked it up yet and already disappointed with this purchase. Imperfection on the right corner of the lid looks cheap and I had to get a different wax seal because the one included just fell apart. There weren't any choices for a 10" rough in at my local Lowes so I had to travel almost 30 miles to a nearby town who had these in stock. Don't know if I want to drive back and return it or make do for now and replace it later. What a waste of time and money.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Fits the need
Author: JoeEngineer
Review: Toilet works great although the flush is a bit odd; press flush handle quickly for light flush or hold 2-3 seconds for full flush. So, it's a dual-flush without the extra cost...? Installation went surprisingly well for being my first toilet installation ever. Manufacturer provides clear instructions that made it easy, although I must say it was disconcerting to read, paraphrasing, "Tighten all three tank-to-bowl nuts, fill tank, and check for leaks. If it leaks, tighten them each 1/2 turn and recheck." Hmmm. Mine did not leak at all, so I'm satisfied overall.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Wont Seal At Water Tank
Author: GMONEY
Review: I bought this toilet without reading reviews as I needed one quickly and saw it was made in the USA. I have installed toilets before and did not think anything of it. Once installed I noticed a small leak coming from the gasket where the water tank mounts. The three bolt system is difficult to get a water tight seal. I tried for several days to get this tank to seal. No matter what I did I could not get it to stop leaking. After three days of wrestling with this thing I decided to return it. This seems to be a common occurrence with this model and was very frustrated by day three. The seal on this tank is poor.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Rick
Author: Rick
Review: I don't install a lot of toilets. I purchased this one because it the physical requirements of the installation. I do have considerable mechanical experience and found the instructions lacking. What was missing was shimming up the bottom of the base so the assembly is stable and sealing with silicon. I am unclear whether to do this but this is a usual step with most toilet installations. The other thing is the problem with the tank to bowl seal. I did read other reviews before I purchased this toilet but mistakenly discounted this problem. Today is Sunday and I have to (and will) come up with a solution.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield summit
Author: Rick
Review: Bought this toilet in may 2022, insulation went vey well, the only problem I had was the supplied rubber tank too bowl screws would not stop leaking from the water tank , I had too drain the water from the tank and dry it out, and those rubber screws. I then applied silicone caulking on the rubber screws, and lightly tightened the screws , and let sit over night, the next day I added water and all seamed good. No leaks.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Absolute Junk
Author: Tyoung
Review: I needed the 10" rough in size for my application, being made in the USA I thought it would be a good choice. This toilet is absolute junk, I have installed many toilets in my day and this is by far the worst one to date. None of the gaskets seal and the fit and finish on the tank is terrible. I am past the return date as this project got held up. I am very disappointed with lowes and Mansfield.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: No leaks
Author: Rudeb
Review: I read the reviews on how a lot of them said that it kept leaking through the rubber gaskets, I decided to buy this toilet because I needed a 10 inch rough in and it was the only one in stock that was elongated so i gave it a try. I had no leaks at all and it works great! I would have given it 5 stars but i did noticed that if you hold down handle a couple of seconds that you do get a better flush but works fine with quick flush. All in all the toilet looks great and it works well!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Use a different tank to bowl gasket
Review: I did not like the tank to bowl gasket seem very cheap made. I bought a different gasket to use and threw the other one away

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Not worth the price.
Author: John
Review: I bought this toilet because I wanted made in the USA. Easy installation and looks good. The problem is it takes 5 minutes to fill the toilet. I checked my water pressure going into the toilet and everything is good. Somewhere in the internal mechanics it only allows a trickle. Very disappointed.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Garbage
Author: NotHappy
Review: This is the worst toilet I have ever seen. It won’t stop leaking from the tank. It bolts down in the very back of the base so the toilet tips back very easily. Nothing holds it in the front other than gravity. Most toilets have the bolts closer to the center. I hope I can return this.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Ok toilet
Author: BrandyeGyrl
Review: So far so good. The toilet seat gets stuck trying to close but I suspect that’ll get easier as time goes on. Must hold handle down for a strong flush. Overall, it’s ok.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great toilet
Author: Kevin P
Review: Easy to assemble and install. No leaking issues at all. I would recommend this.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: love it
Author: bigj6ft4
Review: had bathroom redone went with a high dollar kohler but didn't know i had 10 in rough in plumbing so i took it back and purchased this. Being a little skeptical as i never heard of company. with a little research i bought it and love it. Tock a big ole healthy load off yesterday for the true test and shoved in a bunch of paper and i thought it was a commercial; toilet lol All gone and fast refill I would purchase again

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Review: The main part that fits to the bowl for the water inlet leaked. This was done at the factory

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Of apparent good quality except for the cheap lid
Author: MrBill3d
Review: Appears to be of quality construction. flushes well and is a nice height. However, that seat lid (not the seat itself) is of the thinnest plastic and if you sit on it it will skew to one side. I already replaced it with one from the same company which does not make me happy.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good product / Happy with purchase
Author: cpuboy
Review: I needed a new toilet with a 10 inch rough in on a Sunday, I was concerned this was not a big name, but am happy with the purchase, installed easily, still "tuning" the float to make it flush just right, but if you are on the fence with this one, its a good toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great price great toilet
Author: Coop
Review: The original toilet leaked so we had to purchase a second one which worked out perfectly, I would like to thank Dustin from Lowes who called me because he knew we had a problem with the first one and he made everything right, so thank you.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Author: HoemOwner
Review: Not the quality I was hoping for. I installed another mansfield toilet and it was all good. This one had chips in tank top. Not visible so I continued on. Well months later when the tank stops filling it squeels like a bad horn. I

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Inspect before you take home
Author: Hpm555
Review: They package this product upside down so The first one we bought had the tank flange destroyed. The exchanged it with out any problems but it delayed our install several days. Once installed the product worked great.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Terrible Toilet needs to go down the drain.
Author: Honest Reviews with Ryan
Review: This Toilet was terrible. The bowl and the tank were incorrectly made to fit together and leaked when installed. I had to take this product back to Lowe's. Don't buy it!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: The Perfect Gift
Author: QueenBee
Review: This toilet was a "gift" for my grandchildren. They've been without one for some time and this one was a perfect fit. It also was the right price. Thanks Lowes!

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield summit,10” rough in
Author: Rick60
Review: Was very easy too install, didn’t even have to adjust the water fill. Has a powerful flush. I would recommend this too any do it yourselfer

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good Size and Shape
Review: Size and shape . My plumber that installed in my bathroom he was impressed and kept saying you got a nice toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice buy
Author: amlee83
Review: Decent toilet for spaces that do not allow the standard in the space like old building apartments.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Make sure you measure rough-in before purchasing!
Author: Marge
Review: Tank is too tall, toilet seat and lid are flimsy. But it was the only 10” rough-in available.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)

Review: Grateful for the 10 inch rough-in. Saved me hundreds of dollars if pipe needed to be moved.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good product for the price.

Review: We like this brand for our rentals. Lasts longer than American Standard.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Excellent quality.
Author: Bonny
Review: Great add on to my home. Getting older and wanted a higher toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: works
Author: jim the defecator
Review: easy to sit on but makes a loud sound on weater cutoff

Product_name: Mansfield Summit White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 10-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Manufactures Defect
Author: Unsatisfied
Review: Item has defect and needs replaced. Cannot be used.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice USA Commode
Author: jimbo
Review: Nice looking commode, installed easily. All parts were included except the line to connect the commode to the water supply. I purchased brass floor bolts to use instead of the steel ones supplied by the manufacturer, because they are rust-proof and were easier to saw off (both the original and the brass ones were too long). I like the forceful swirl-type flush. Time will tell if it is effective in cleaning the bowl well, but I expect it to. I also like that the toilet seat is a no-slam design. The push-button quick removal design of the toilet seat is also a nice hygienic touch. The old one had a hard to clean area under the hinge section.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Best toilet ever !
Author: Jackmag
Review: This has to be the best toilet I’ve installed I have the previous vanquish model which I liked very much but this is better. It only takes one flush to clear the bowl which is fast and strong. It is easy to install everything is included except a wrench. The redesigned seat is a little tricky but worth the few extra minutes to install. Very simple to remove push a silver button and it lifts off to clean underneath then pop it back on the two pins and your done. When it is in the up position the seat fits into the lid with two little tabs to assist to open or close.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: IF YOU LIKE HIGH QUALITY
Author: Rick
Review: Mansfield hit it out of the park with this one. Super high quality with all the parts. The seat is an ingenious idea and works great. The swirl jet gets everything out the first time. The only issue I had on the installation is getting the tank to seal with the bowl. I don’t like the idea of only having the front of the tank come in contact with the bowl. It leaves it open to over tighten the tank and crack it. For that reason I was a leery of over tightening it. Took the tank back off several times to insure it was installed correctly. Everything else went perfectly and easily. Superior product. Very pleased and I’m very fussy ask my wife!!

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Awesome Toilet Package - Taller Seat Height
Author: WILL
Review: This is a great package deal. Everything you need between your water supply line and your toilet flange in the floor. ADA compliant "comfort" height makes getting up and down significantly easier for older people, people with disabilities, or people with arthritis and general mobility issues. This toilet has very nice finishes. Love the snap on, quick release toilet seat, which will make cleaning way easier too. Can't ask for anything more.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Vanquish 2 Elongated Chair Height Commode
Author: HandymanDon
Review: The Vanquish 2 Elongated Chair Height Watersense Commode is an excellent value. Everything you need is in the box…just bring tools to the party. The fit and finish of the commode is excellent. The instructions are clear and it is very easy to put together. I installed in a little less than an hour including bidet under the seat. We are very impressed…you can’t go wrong with this kit.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Soft close lid
Author: SoccerMom
Review: When we remodeled our bathroom, our toilet was off white colored. This toilet is pure white and elongated. It has a soft closed lid. It was easy to install and comes with everything needed.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: A Few Issues
Author: Johnathan
Review: The toilet is very nicely package, has a good style and features a really cool two tabbed lit set. Unfortunately some of the components weren't high quality and leaked. Specifically the tank gasket wasn't sound. Also the plastic connection bolts weren't of sound quality.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Awesomeness
Author: Fred
Review: Awesomeness in a toilet , sounds funny but it is true. The quick release seat is a really unique idea and makes cleaning so much easier just like the way it flushes , the swirling when it flushes cleans the bowl so much more efficiently

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Premium feeling toilet with 2 awesome features.
Author: Austin
Review: So far this is a very good toilet. It feels very premium. It has a flapper style flush valve which should hold up just fine but it's much easier to maintain than the new style. The 2 best features on this toilet are the soft close lid and the lid removal system. If you lift the lid, there's a button you can press to pull the lid off to clean. So nice. There was a manufacturing issue where the gasket on the flush valve was folded over causing a leak, but we were able to get that resolved. Overall a decent toilet; happy with this one.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good Looks and Performance
Author: Zim5
Review: The toilet is very attractive and has a strong flush. All waste is removed with one flush. The seat is soft-close and recessed into the lif which is a nice look. The seat also has a quick release button for easy cleaning. The flush is a little louder than other toilets but not terrible. The only negative is that i had to replace the flush valve as the toilet leaked continually. Even after several attempts at reinstalling. Not a big deL since the part is cheap and easy to awap ou.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great product, shipping was flawless!
Author: WindyHillFarm
Review: The toilet is sleek looking and has and well made. While it's extra high which is great for people with disabilities or knee problems it seems to take up less space and will make the bathroom feel a little bigger. I'm pretty happy with this toilet - since it's something I will have to use regularly I'm glad that we got it.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: high quality, Flushes well, cleans up, fills quiet
Author: Leo
Review: Excellent, high quality toilet. I notice immediately it was much heavier that the Kol toilet it was replacing. Nothing cheap about it. Guts are standard flowmaster, nothing fancy but solid stuff. Packaged perfect, parts in individual boxes with good instructions. Delivery was delayed but it's holiday time so not a problem. Easy installation for most part. Toilet mount bolts were too short for my tiled floor. Had to purchase 3.5 lag bolts, no big deal. Toilet water bowl is the 2 bolt mount. No issue with leaks, bolted up nice, however still has a little tilt forward so I shimmed tank with small piece of plastic shim to level it out. Toilet seat self closing- First time I ever had to look at instructions to mount a toilet seat! Probably took longer to mount seat that the complete toilet. Didn't help that my wife was watching and wanted it perfectly line up! Very satisfied with this toilet. No leaks, straight forward install. Very quiet operation. Flushes well and cleans up easy. Wife says it looks very high standard compared to contractor grade toilets. Much happier now with the lever flush than the center top lid push button on other toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great toilet with slow close lid!
Author: DVC72680
Review: This is a very nice toilet setup. The two piece (bowl & tank) seem to be made very well. Unlike other toilets I have purchased this one comes with everything needed included the wax ring. All plumbing inside the tank pre-assembled to help speed up the installation process.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Very easy to install
Author: Ron
Review: The Mansfield toilet is an excellent product. All dimensions are industry standard. This product is chair height and complies with ADA guidelines. The finish is smooth and consistent. Right out of the box you have everything you need to install except the supply line. It is equipped with a slow close seat and lid. Compared to others I have recently installed, this one was so easy. I highly recommend.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansville chair, height toilet
Author: FGS
Review: Complete comes with fluid master fill and flush valve, seat is included with quick release buttons for easy cleaning. Side mounted chrome trip lever to flush the toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: New Throne
Author: Crossbones
Review: I have not had a chance to install mine yet. I do have a friend that owns one and the flush valve seems mighty strong almost like commercial. I am replacing a 20-year-old toilet with this new one and expect many years of great use and fine ideas. 🤣

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Quick and Silent Flusher
Author: Tish
Review: Love the smaller reservoir tank and slow lowering seat. Wish the seat covered the entire commode. Easy to install. you have to hold down the lever to flush.

Product_name: Mansfield Vanquish 2 White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great Look Toilet
Author: Smokeyak
Review: It a great look toilet. It flushes everything in one flash. Everything is included wax ring and mounting bolts. The stuff in the tank is preassembled which allow an easy installation. I would recommend this toilet for anyone.
